data.message: Why does the flying hearts work for some people and not for others? I don't have them! :(

replies.message: Hi Kerri. We recommend that you update your mobile app in order to get the experience. If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2cLglsO. -Jessica
Facebook I'm not on mobile. I'm on MacBooks - can't get them either place.
Hey Kerri. Have you tried holding the mouse cursor over the Like button? The six Reactions will pop up, and you simply tap love. We hope this helps! -Jessica
Facebook, Jessica it's not working anymore

Facebook LOL. Yes, I know how to "love" a post, I've been loving things all day hoping it would work, but it isn't. I've signed in and back out, too. Ah, well, at least I got to see it in the video when I came over here. There's a whole thread going on my page about this. It's working for some, but apparently not all. I've reported. Thanks for your help. Peace and <3!
OMG Facebook you just call that lady  D* , thats very rude!!!  by the way mine its NOT WORKING EITHER 😡 ✌

Patrícia De Moura I don't think she meant to imply that I'm stupid. I know a lot of people who have problems with technical stuff and I would suppose some don't know how to get the other reaction icons to come up. I'm chill. Today is about peace and love! :) <3
I enjoy this, wish it would stay. ❤

fb ...Please help me.. Do not ignore me. can see I send the message for you? 
https://youtu.be/3aAYUWBwsuE
